Title: A Day in the Life of Ranger Smith
Description: Originally aired on Cartoon Network in 1999 , this was a homage to Yogi Bear / Ranger Smith and an original animation by Spumco

Title: The Animation Show
Description: Animated shorts from The Animation Show 2003 . Featured Billy 's Balloon , Intermission , and Mike 's Pencil Test . Aired in November 2005

Title: Batman : Strange Days
Description: Animated short created for Batman 's 75th anniversary . Originally broadcast on Cartoon Network as part of DC Nation . Aired May 10 , 2014 during a commercial break of a Beware the Batman episode

Title: Batman Beyond
Description: Animated short created for Batman 's 75th anniversary . Originally broadcast on Cartoon Network as part of DC Nation . Aired August 2 , 2014 during a commercial break of a Beware the Batman episode . Not to be confused with the television series of the same name

Title: Boo Boo Runs Wild
Description: Originally aired on Cartoon Network in 1999 , this was a homage to Yogi Bear/Ranger Smith and an original animation by Spümcø

Title: Kakurenbo : Hide and Seek
Description: Japanese animated short centering around demonic themes . Aired October 31 , 2005

Title: Kick-Heart
Description: Animated short by Production I.G . Aired August 31 , 2013 on Toonami . Aired for a third time as daylight saving time filler on November 2 , 2013

Title: Night of the Living Doo
Description: A Scooby-Doo short written by Casper Kelly and Jeff Olson . The short was originally a part of Cartoon Network 's The Scooby Project

Title: The Jetsons : Father and Son Day
Description: Flash animated short made by Spümcø based on The Jetsons

Title: The Jetsons : The Best Son
Description: Flash animated short made by Spümcø based on The Jetsons
